Comments_List: I learned about the composition and history of the book of Isaiah.
Gained a better understanding of issues in the compositional history of Isaiah.

I wish the course had encouraged more discussion and interaction with the texts we were assigned. I also think the course could have benefitted from more structure. As it was, I found it difficult to follow most days, and that impacted what I was able to learn from the course.
Yes, I would recommend this course to any student interested in prophetic textual tradition.

I would not. Again, I felt the course lacked structure and was difficult to follow and engage with. I feel as though I just as easily could have gotten the syllabus and just read the assigned texts in order to gain the same level of information.
